name: Prism AI
description: Prism AI is a full-stack intelligence platform that transforms raw blockchain data into structured, real-time insight. It’s not just about showing transactions. Prism AI reveals behavior, surfacing the deeper signals behind wallets, trends, and flows across chains. While most tools display raw transactions, Prism AI decodes wallet behavior, identifies narrative shifts, and maps on-chain flows with real-time intelligence across multiple chains. Our platform blends behavioral analytics, AI-driven clustering, and multi-chain indexing to uncover insights that are invisible to standard explorers. It’s a full-stack intelligence layer designed for signal over noise.
